repairedDockerfile:
FROM nacyot/lua-lua:apt 
MAINTAINER Cristian Romo "cristian.g.romo@gmail.com" 
RUN apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y lua5.2-dev && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN wget https://luarocks.org/releases/luarocks-2.2.0.tar.gz && \
tar zxpf luarocks-2.2.0.tar.gz && \
cd luarocks-2.2.0 && \
 ./configure --build="$(dpkg-architecture --query DEB_BUILD_GNU_TYPE)" && \
make bootstrap && \
cd .. && \
rm -rf luarocks-2.2.0.tar.gz luarocks-2.2.0
RUN luarocks install moonscript 

#RUN mkdir /source 
WORKDIR /source 
CMD ["bash"]
